page.title: 16PLACES OF WORSHIP IN BASLOW
page.content:
St.Anne's Church has existed for 800 years. It has over 150 members. There are 4 services each Sunday and activities include the Choir, Mothers' Union, Men's Society, Bible Study, and bell ringing. Young people may attend the Youth Club, the Discoverers group,and sing in the Choir.The Vicar is a Governor of the village C.E. primary school.
The original Methodist Chapel was sold several years ago but the existing Sunday School was extensively redesigned and emerged as the new Chapel, which is also used for meetings and coffee mornings. Close links exist with St. Anne's Church and both run the Sunday School and Youth Club. United services are held every quarter and on special occasions.
